title: LRC Leerdam
text: Leerdamse Racing Club uit Leerdam, known as LRC Leerdam, is a <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club from <a href="Leerdam">Leerdam</a>, <a href="Netherlands">Netherlands</a>. The club was founded in 1958. The first male squad plays in the <a href="Eerste%20Klasse">Eerste Klasse</a> since 2016, when it relegated after a year in the <a href="Hoofdklasse">Hoofdklasse</a>.
